function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion due to social isolation and increased indoor activities like cooking and baking together with children.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of spreading contagious diseases within the family.","Mitigation":"Encourage ventilation and air circulation in home kitchens, promote hand hygiene, and limit physical contact during food preparation.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, smart ventilation systems, touchless kitchen appliances.","People":"Families with children, nutritionists, chefs.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, home appliance manufacturers."},{"Description":"Inefficient diagnostic procedures and increased pressure on health-care services.","Impact":"Longer wait times for patients, delayed treatment, and potential misdiagnoses.","Mitigation":"Implement image recognition technology for faster diagnostic processes, develop telemedicine applications for remote patient consultations.","Technologies":"Image recognition software, telemedicine platforms, AI-assisted diagnostic tools.","People":"Doctors, patients, health-care providers.","Owner":"Medical technology companies, health-care organizations, government health departments."}]}
